Icon list

Use an icon list to create a list with styled bullets. You can choose each icon from the font that is used.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-icon-list

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-icon-list

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-icon-list/src/scss/icon-list";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Icon list

List of items with icon before.

  • Bouwen, wonen en energie
  • Cultuur, sport en vrije tijd
  • Gezin, welzijn en gezondheid 
      <ul class="vl-icon-list"><li class="vl-icon-list__item">
        <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-tag" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        Bouwen, wonen en energie
      </li><li class="vl-icon-list__item">
        <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-tag" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        Cultuur, sport en vrije tijd
      </li><li class="vl-icon-list__item">
        <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-tag" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        Gezin, welzijn en gezondheid
      </li></ul>
